name: ragweed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant that has narrow stems with groups of yellow flowers, known as an allergen (= a substance that can cause people to have a bad physical reaction): Ragweed is a common cause of hay fever. He's allergic to ragweed pollen.
More examplesFewer examplesChamomile is part of the family that includes ragweed and chrysanthemum.He advised people to avoid echinacea if they have allergies to ragweed, daisy, or sunflower.Researchers found that ragweed was a commonly cited source of seasonal allergies.A single ragweed plant can release one million pollen grains in a day.
